snippet: Internet gambling in the United States is off to a slower start than many had imagined, held back, experts say, by illegal offshore operators who are continuing to draw users and siphon off millions of dollars....

headline.print_headline: Experts: Online Gambling Slowed by Illegal Action
headline.main: Experts: Online Gambling Slowed by Illegal Action

lead_paragraph: Internet gambling in the United States is off to a slower start than many had imagined, held back, experts say, by illegal offshore operators who are continuing to draw users and siphon off millions of dollars.
